definitions.definition: An act by which something or somebody is listened to.
examples: This symphony grows on me more and more with each listening .
OK, students, today we're going to do a couple of listenings about the environment, then a reading about crime.

definitions.definition: Skill or ability of perceiving spoken language.
examples: You can improve your listening well by watching English-language films.

main_definition: An act by which something or somebody is listened to.
secondary_definitions: Skill or ability of perceiving spoken language.
